DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine prevalence oral habit among primary Egyptian school child Cairo Governorate , Egypt .
DOC.brief_title: The Prevalence Oral Habits Group Primary School Children Cairo Governorate
DOC.detailed_description: This aim study determine prevalence oral habit among primary Egyptian school child Cairo Governorate , Egypt . PICO : P : Egyptian primary school child 7 - 10 year old O : Prevalence oral habit Primary Outcome : Prevalence Oral Habit ; Device Measurement : Questionnaire ; Unit Measurement : Binary .
DOC.criteria: Cooperative child 710 year old Children intellectual problem Children orthodontic appliance Medically compromise child Children family refuse participate study
